TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WorkflowTheme extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class WorkflowTheme Implements IDisposable
public ref class WorkflowTheme sealed : IDisposable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 為設計階段環境的工作流程提供外觀及操作屬性設定。

span.span: Provides the look and feel property settings to a workflow in design-time environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流程主題定義了工作流程設計介面的外觀及操作。Workflow themes define the look and feel of a workflow design surface. 這包含針對工作流程定義的背景樣式、前景樣式、字型和圖示。This includes background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow. 為針對特定工作流程定義的主題。A is a theme defined for a specific workflow. 如果不需要特定的工作流程主題，可將 類別用做預設屬性。The class can be used for default properties if a specific workflow theme is not desired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會描述工作流程設計介面的外觀及操作。The describes the look and feel of a workflow design surface. 這包含針對工作流程設計介面定義的背景樣式、前景樣式、字型和圖示。This includes background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow design surface. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何存取 `AmbientTheme` 屬性。The following example demonstrates how to access the `AmbientTheme` property. 這個範例來自＜追蹤設定檔設計工具 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Tracking Profile Designer 範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 對用來顯示工作流程的主題進行變更。Use to make changes to the theme used to display the workflow. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性存取與工作流程關聯的 。The following code example shows how to use the property to access the associated with a workflow. 這個程式碼範例是 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 檔案中＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工作流程監視](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
